programme.title: Cougar
programme.desc: Donna and her young college son Brandon live in a nice suburban area of Atlanta, until a new and mysterious older woman moves in next door. Donna invites her over to dinner where she and Brandon connect, and build a connection that is deadly and manipulative. A mother must save her son before it’s too late.

programme.title: The Foreign Exchange Student
programme.desc: Sinclair John is a beautiful, troubled, young high school senior from Dominica. When her parents suspect she may have had something to do with her boyfriends death, they ship her to America under the Foreign Exchange Student Program. While living with her new family, she wreaks havoc and it's up to Jackie to stop her.

programme.title: The Foreign Exchange Student 2: The Hunt
programme.desc: Mr. & Mrs. Nelson are excited to be getting two new foreign exchange students to live with them. All of a sudden a chain of murders start to happen again in the city of Houston. Is it connected to Sinclair's death? Who's bringing terror back?

programme.title: The Love App
programme.desc: Rachel is a promising young woman getting over a recent breakup while her friend signs her up for a dating app unbeknownst to her. She is presented three blind dates to choose from. Little does she know, one of them is a serial killer.

programme.title: The Hanged Man
programme.desc: The astonishing true life story of Ron Van Clief, the first black martial arts movie star, known as “The Black Dragon”. His determination to win, despite horrific odds, exacts a heavy toll with spectacular highs and devastating lows.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: A group of kids stumble across something unfamiliar, and have no idea of the adventure that awaits them. When the games begin the eye chooses its course.

programme.title: The Housekeeper 2
programme.desc: After moving on from her sordid past, Sharease flourishes in her new life and success. When her son Adonis kidnapped, she seeks help from a ghost of her past to rescue him.

programme.title: Hoodie Girls Gang
programme.desc: Kayla's boyfriend Jamal is jailed and needs $10,000 bail. Desperate, Kayla and her friends plan an armed robbery. However, the heist goes wrong, and the police are on their trail. To make matters worse, Jamal's boss, Sean, demands payment for the drugs Jamal was transporting. Kayla must now free Jamal and escape town before both the police and Sean catch up to her.

programme.title: CODE
programme.desc: Dallas artist MALIK SCHAEFER, also known as CODE, is a rising star in the underground rap scene. Although his checkered past has led him down the wrong road at times, with the help of his best friend, STYLES, Malik is back on the fast-track to success. That is, until he reconnects with the dangerous love of his life, SOPHIA ORTEGA, who threatens to destroy it all. Malik must decide to either follow his heart or live by the code that has served him well for many years: family over everything.

programme.title: Rackades
programme.desc: Ricky and his two friends are introduced to a life of scamming and finesse. Everything seems to be going great until they cross the wrong one, and their lives are changed forever.

programme.title: Mistress for Hire
programme.desc: Skylar works as a professional mistress hired by women for divorce leverage. When she finds herself falling for her target, Eric, she questions her career and her motives. But when Eric’s wife, Octavia, won’t allow Skylar to destroy her plans, and a dangerous game of cat and mouse ensues, with love and survival on the line.

programme.title: Back Home
programme.desc: Drug kingpin Jay looks to expand his drug empire with the help of his business partners, and his girlfriend Passion. However, Polo and Marco have their own agenda’s, which could lead to chaos, as a potential drug war descends upon Atlanta.

programme.title: Troublesome
programme.desc: Veteran homicide detective Michael reluctantly partners with rookie Derrick. Witnessing a double homicide, they survive a deadly chase, but Derrick is wounded. The suspects are linked to the kingpin, who retaliates by ordering murders across the city. As chaos erupts, the FBI joins the case, revealing the kingpin's identity. Michael finds a weak link, offering a chance to finally catch him.

programme.title: All the Love
programme.desc: A young woman begins her journey to adulthood, navigating love and self-discovery, while being haunted by a mysterious past that she can’t fully remember. As murders and violence swirl around her, she wonders who she can trust. Will she find love or suffer the same mysterious fate as her birth parents?

programme.title: Crush
programme.desc: Haunted by her past, a young woman's life is complicated by love, self-discovery, and surrounding violence.
